channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sound Smart: 7 Observations from the NFL in Week 16
item.description: Who's the Super Bowl favorite? Are the Bears for real? Are the Jaguars? Henry McKenna offers a big-picture look at Week 16.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the Patriots' Win Over the Ravens
item.description: The Patriots clinched a playoff berth while the Ravens fell into a potentially insurmountable hole. Here's what we learned about both teams.

item.title: Ravens QB Lamar Jackson Ruled Out Early vs. Patriots With Back Injury
item.description: The two-time MVP quarterback's health is a cause for concern after he was forced out of the Ravens' Week 16 game against the Patriots.

item.title: 2025 NFL Odds Week 17: Lines, Spreads for all 16 Games
item.description: Check out the odds for every NFL Week 17 matchup, beginning with Christmas Day.

item.title: NFL Week 16 Team of the Week: Puka Nacua Undeniable; Trevor Lawrence Makes Statement
item.description: Here is the best of the best from NFL Week 16 across offense, defense and special teams.

item.title: Lions own loss after late OPI calls: 'It's on us'
item.description: The Detroit Lions owned their big loss after late offensive pass interference calls, with coach Dan Campbell saying, "It's on us."
